name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A man in Hunan Province hacked and killed six people, including the elderly and children, after getting divorced. He was recently taken to the execution ground to be executed.
According to the notice of Changde Intermediate People's Court in Hunan Province, Wang Zhaojun divorced Zhang Meiyun in 2021. After killing Zhang Meiyun in the same year, Wang Zhaojun thought of the conflicts with Hu Dacheng and Yang Xianjun, so he hacked Hu Dacheng and his old mother to death. Then he went to Yang Xianjun's home and killed his 8-year-old daughter, 10-year-old son, and 46-year-old father. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi9JVDwbcAAO10q.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Yuyao, Zhejiang, a student from Yuyao Shinan Middle School reported that the director of the political education department searched students' schoolbags for contraband during lunch break, and his chili sauce and pickled cabbage were thrown away by the director, so he was so angry that he confronted the director and was dragged by the director. Previously, a student had his 1,000 yuan card confiscated. After posting the video online, he and his father were talked to by the vice principal and asked to delete the video. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886818920604274688/pu/img/MivviL6WDAPNefEP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"When facts and laws are not important, a guilty verdict is only a matter of time."

Ma Yanhu, a Muslim from Ningxia, has been working as a tourism organizer leading Chinese Muslims to the Islamic holy city of Mecca in Saudi Arabia for 20 years. For all Muslims who are physically and financially capable, the Hajj is a task that must be completed at least once in their lifetime.

However, after the introduction of the Regulations on Religious Affairs in 2018, Chinese officials began to crack down on such pilgrimages. In 2020, Chinese officials required that all pilgrimages must be organized by the Chinese Islamic Association, which is affiliated with the United Front Work Department.

Because of these restrictions, Ma Yanhu stopped leading groups to Mecca in 2020 in accordance with the regulations, and only helped believers book air tickets and apply for visas. However, on April 24, 2023, Ma Yanhu was still arrested on charges of "illegal operation and disrupting market order." Six months later,...
fullContent:
“当事实和法律都不重要时，有罪判决只是时间问题”。

马彦虎，一位来自宁夏的穆斯林，20年来，他一直从事带领中国穆斯林前往沙特伊斯兰圣城麦加朝觐的旅游组织工作。对于所有体力和经济条件允许的穆斯林，朝觐是在一生中都必须至少完成一次的功课。

然而，2018年的《宗教事务条例》出台后，中国官方却开始打击这种朝觐活动，2020年，中国官方要求所有朝觐活动都必须由隶属于统战部的中国伊斯兰教协会来组织。

因为这些限制，马彦虎在2020年便按照条例规定，停止了带团去麦加，仅帮助信众预订机票和申请签证。然而，2023 年 4 月 24 日，马彦虎依然被捕，被捕的罪名是“非法经营，扰乱市场秩序”。六个月后，他的罪名又变成了“非法越境”，并被判处有期徒刑8年。

马彦虎提出了上诉。他认为，所有朝觐活动必须通过中国伊斯兰教协会，且该协会还收取服务费，这违反了《反垄断法》，但上诉被驳回。

在辩白中，马彦虎说，“如果他们判定某人有罪，那么该人就必定有罪，无论事实和法律如何。这是对中国法律尊严的公然践踏，是对国家司法制度的无情嘲讽。”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Student feedback:
http://611Study.ICU The school on the list is Zhengzhou Foreign Language New Fengyang School.
The senior year was originally scheduled to start on the 5th, but on the afternoon of the 4th, it was suddenly notified that the class would be changed to online classes.

content: On February 4, netizens reported to the Chuzhou City Education Bureau of Anhui Province that Dingyuan Middle School in Chuzhou City started school early. The Education Bureau responded: If you don't go to school early, it's over. What's there to report? If he violated the rules, you just don't follow the rules. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886927416653754368/pu/img/G2epz_mNy4ABVHqP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The United States Postal Service (USPS) announced on February 4 that it would suspend the acceptance of parcels from mainland China and Hong Kong from the 4th until further notice.
The USPS statement said that letters and ordinary mail are not included in the suspension of acceptance.
The US Postal Service did not immediately comment on whether this was related to the change in US President Trump's termination of "minimum" shipments from China and other countries. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi_9pPAa4AEt1xM.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 5, Zhao Lijian’s wife “Da Cong and Chou Ya Tou” posted a message saying, “The wife of a Pakistani embassy staff member has advanced lymphoma. After more than half a year of treatment by an old Chinese doctor, she went to a western hospital for a checkup and all indicators were normal.” In addition, she also shared a Chinese medicine prescription. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjAviVVbIAAqKDk.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump is reportedly considering adding Shein and Temu to the "forced labor" list.
Reuters quoted Semafor as saying that the US President Trump's administration is discussing whether to include Chinese e-commerce retailers Shein and Temu on the "forced labor" sanctions list of the US Department of Homeland Security (DHS).
The report quoted sources as saying that the Trump administration has not made a final decision on the matter and may eventually give up on including it on the list. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjAzFZaaAAAN0MS.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 5, Zhao Lijian’s wife “Da Congminghe Chou Yatou” posted a message saying, “The wife of a Pakistani embassy staff member is in the late stage of lymphoma. After more than half a year of treatment by an old Chinese doctor, she went to a Western hospital for a check-up and all indicators were normal.” In addition, she also kindly shared a Chinese medicine prescription.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 3, Zhou Shifeng, a human rights lawyer involved in the 709 case, filed a complaint with the Beijing Internet Court, suing Tencent, accusing the company of violating his right to freedom of communication, personal dignity and property rights by permanently banning his WeChat account on November 22 last year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangxi, a woman posted a message saying that her cousin, who was born in 1985, was unmarried and childless, and her father could not stand her raising a cat as a child, so in order to force her to get married and have children, he slaughtered and ate her one-year-old cat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Bloomberg: China's State Administration for Market Regulation is preparing to investigate Apple. Sources said that the Chinese market supervision bureau intends to investigate Apple's practice of charging up to 30% commission for in-app purchases and excluding third-party payment services.
The report said that this move is part of a series of measures that China is preparing to take in response to the trade war with the United States. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjBAmplboAA9PrT.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yonhap News Agency: Among the belongings of North Korean soldiers killed in the Kursk region, a Samsung mobile phone was found, as well as a letter of condolence from Kim Jong-un to the soldiers, which read: "As the New Year approaches, you will miss your motherland and your beloved parents, wives, children, and brothers more than ever before" and "I don't know what words to use to encourage and thank you for your dedication and hard work in the war." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjBDjOpbUAAU9sK.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 4 (Published) A blogger said that Soviet logic is a fallacy disguised as logic. If you discuss facts with them, they will argue with you; if you want to have a good debate, they will directly label you as a "China-hating party". For example, if a person makes a mistake, according to Soviet logic, they will say: Although he made a mistake, doesn't he have any merits? If you refute, they will attack you again: Have you never made a mistake? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887085256316243968/pu/img/GJiJhmJWpXkXFPHO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 1, B station blogger "科技老孩孩" compared Telegram and WeChat and came to the following conclusions: 1: WeChat's interface is too bloated. 2: WeChat's multi-platform login will cause chat history loss and other problems. 3: WeChat group chat QR code is only valid for 7 days, and group members need to invite to join the group when there are more than 200 people. 4: WeChat cannot send files larger than 100m. 5: WeChat takes up memory space. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887089361403195392/pu/img/uQ58ywxFIRpmYoU9.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ding Linwei, a Chinese software engineer who once worked at Google, was charged by the U.S. Department of Justice on Tuesday with new charges, accusing him of stealing trade secrets to help China develop its artificial intelligence industry.
Ding Linwei was hired by Google in 2019. According to the revised indictment, between May 2022 and May 2023, he allegedly uploaded more than 1,000 files containing confidential company information to his personal Google Cloud account. Prosecutors pointed out that these trade secrets involved the hardware infrastructure and software platforms used by Google's supercomputer data centers to train large AI models.
During this period, Ding Linwei was hired as chief technology officer by a Chinese technology company. In 2023, he founded a second technology company in China focusing on AI and machine learning, and uploaded more files to the Google Cloud account in 2023. Prosecutors said Ding Linwei did not disclose to Google that he had previously uploaded 1...
fullContent:
一名曾在谷歌工作的中国软件工程师丁林葳被美国司法部于周二提出新指控，指控他涉嫌窃取商业机密以助中国发展人工智能产业。
 丁林葳2019年受雇于谷歌，根据修订版起诉书，在2022年5月至2023年5月间，他涉嫌将超过1000份包含公司机密信息的文件上传至他的个人Google Cloud账户。检察官指出这些商业机密涉及谷歌超级计算机数据中心用于训练大型AI模型的硬件基础设施和软件平台。
 在此期间，丁林葳被一家中国科技公司聘为首席技术官。2023年他在中国成立第二家以AI和机器学习为重点的科技公司，并在2023年上传了更多文件到Google Cloud账户，检察官称丁林葳并未向谷歌披露此前上传了1000份文件，也没有告诉谷歌他与这些中国公司的联系。
 谷歌是在发现丁以其中一家公司的首席执行官身份在北京参加投资者会议后，揭露了这些上传行为。大约在同一时间，丁告诉其经理他打算离职，并已预订了飞往北京的单程机票。
 2024年1月初，FBI对他的住所执行搜查令，并在两个月后将其逮捕。
 据检察官称，丁每项窃取商业机密的指控最高面临10年监禁和高达25万美元的罚款，每项经济间谍罪的指控最高面临15年监禁和500万美元的罚款。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a shop in Datong, Shanxi Province, was forced to open the door by the urban management staff to turn on the lights because the lights were not on all night. According to reports, before the Spring Festival, the urban management staff came to the shop to inform that all the lights in the shop should be turned on. However, the light box installed outside the shop had been removed by the urban management staff. Because there was no light box, the shop owner had to turn on the door lights. The urban management staff thought it was not in line with the requirements, so they brought people to pry open the door lock and enter the shop to turn on the lights.
Official response: It is indeed inappropriate and is being processed. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjBWbXsbUAAg9CA.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A media person made a "small topic" about the incident of "a shop in Datong, Shanxi was forced to open the door by the urban management for not keeping the lights on all night": Shops are private areas, and no one has the right to enter illegally without permission. Today, they broke into your room and turned on your lights in the name of improving the tourist experience, and tomorrow they can break into your room and divide your property. This is not only hooliganism, but also a trampling of the law and a barbaric humiliation of social civilization. It is intolerable. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjBZeYJbkAAkpWZ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 4, Nanchang, Jiangxi. A man claimed that he was retaliated by the "big memory recovery technique" of the Yinsanjiao police station because he reported the police for taking bribes. The Yinsanjiao police station installed a tiger bench in the duty room, and there was no surveillance in the duty room.
In addition, the police station police also said in the work group that the man and his family were very insidious and cunning, and reminded colleagues in the police station to pay attention to safety. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887110724264341504/pu/img/PHKhyQ6QAGK6tNjs.jpg

As our regional partners continue to grow, they can more easily resist countries like China that promise a lot but deliver little. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjBjglja8AARE6K.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 1 (Release) A cycling blogger applied for a new bank card at Xinjiang Post Bank and was told by the staff that he needed to provide a temporary residence permit and proof of employment. The man asked, "Do all Chinese people have jobs?" The staff said, "Of course they all have jobs." The bank then accused the man of being unreasonable by recording the scene and called the police. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887127761791401984/pu/img/G6WgidnCY1zx44vK.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Ma Xiangyu started a live broadcast to interact with fans. When he said, "In the propaganda department, discipline inspection department, office and other positions, the only interest you have to serve is the interests of the country and the people," the live broadcast room was suddenly banned by the platform.
Ma Xiangyu also said that he is no longer a civil servant and started a live broadcast for a living.
Last year, Ma Xiangyu reported online the violations of discipline and law by Zhu, the director of the Suzhou Industrial Park Commerce Bureau where he worked, and his gang. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887135081086832640/pu/img/BwyUc5FvxmuYq4Fy.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's foreign investment continues to decline, and China's actual use of foreign capital last year fell 27.1% year-on-year
In order to regain foreign investment confidence, He Yadong, a spokesman for the Ministry of Commerce of China, said recently that the Ministry of Commerce will do a good job of "subtracting" the negative list and "adding" to optimize the business environment, so that foreign-funded enterprises can feel at ease, assured, and confident, so that "the next 'China' will still be China" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjB3z3obsAEEurh.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of February 5, the number of schools on the "Shame List" for overtime learning in primary and secondary schools across the country has exceeded 1,000.
So far, a total of 1,039 schools have submitted submissions. The top five provinces are: Shandong (121 schools), Henan (99 schools), Guangdong (92 schools), Hebei (74 schools) and Jiangsu (75 schools).
In terms of data, there are 896 schools with less than 4 days of vacation per month, of which 486 schools have less than 2 days of vacation per month.
All provinces in the country have exceeded the 40 hours of study per week stipulated by the Ministry of Education, and the study time of most schools exceeds twice the time stipulated by the Ministry of Education.
According to the submission data, the provinces with the most suicides in schools in 24 years are Shandong (171 cases), Henan (169 cases), Guangxi (121 cases), Guangdong (111 cases), and Jiangsu (110 cases).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The eighth day of the Lunar New Year is the first day of work after the holiday, but many people reported that they went to the company on the first day of work, only to find that the company had already closed down and the people were gone. A worker said: The company compensated one month's salary, survived the most difficult year of 2024, and ushered in the even more difficult 2025. Netizens said: "I resigned before the New Year. Yesterday, my boss sent me a message asking me where to find a job and take him with me." Some netizens complained that the red envelope for the start of work was only 10 yuan. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887145410235604992/pu/img/6SCsLEaFHsV7jtHf.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At noon on February 4, a middle-aged man suddenly suffered a cardiac arrest while waiting for a train at Changsha South Station and fell to the ground and lost consciousness. He was resuscitated by Dr. Xia of Hunan Second People's Hospital. The first thing the middle-aged man said after waking up was "I have to catch the high-speed train to work" and he said he would not consider going to the hospital for the time being. Under Dr. Xia's persuasion, the man decided to go to the hospital for further treatment. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887150427680186368/pu/img/cw-xPgXnOi1nmaiB.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department of Japan arrested Xu Yaohua, the former third-level secretary of the Chinese Embassy in Japan this morning. 
Xu Yaohua runs a Chinese restaurant in Tokyo. He is accused of defrauding government subsidies during the COVID-19 pandemic. From 20 to 22, he defrauded the state of about 3.75 million yen in subsidies such as the "COVID-19 Business Suspension Support Fund" in 13 times by falsifying the number of employees and forging salary payment records. 
The Metropolitan Police Department conducted simultaneous searches at his home and store this morning. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjCIUWSaEAAmyRI.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xu Yaohua was stationed in Japan from 1986 to 1989, serving as a third-class clerk at the Chinese Embassy. He resigned after his term ended and stayed in Japan to start a business. He founded the restaurant group "East Lake Co., Ltd." and opened the "Imperial Kitchen" restaurant in two high-end areas of Roppongi and Ginza, as well as many Chinese restaurants such as Hong Kong-style dim sum.
The Public Security Department under the Metropolitan Police Department is responsible for intelligence investigation, counter-terrorism, monitoring radical political activities and foreigners, etc. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjCLMn8bsAAHOb0.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://x.com/whyyoutouzhele/status/1886066485493108902

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
WSJ: China's economy is at its weakest in decades, and Beijing's countermeasures are largely symbolic, and their purpose seems to be to send a dual message to the US government: Beijing is willing to risk a broader trade war with the United States, but is also preparing to ease tensions through negotiations.
Many economists say that although China's countermeasures are of great symbolic significance, their actual impact on the US economy is small. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjCNx0HaUAACnJ_.png
